body: Haha I guess it is, but no, I didn‚Äôt really read into it. I just knew it had quite a number of fields to veer into, so I wasn‚Äôt limited by choice. Plus people are fascinatingü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è that was good enough for me.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Third counselling session today. Weather was nice and for once I didn‚Äôt feel like utter shit. Came in pretty okay and didn‚Äôt want to talk about how shitty I feel every single day. After that, it really hit me. I can‚Äôt just base my happiness on a bit of sun. Really I‚Äôm just a bit of carcass sitting out in the sun trying to make the best of shitty situation.

I can‚Äôt go a day without remembering what a fucked up mess I‚Äôm in. How ruined my brain is. I‚Äôm afraid I‚Äôve ruined everything I worked for and it‚Äôs all my fault. I can‚Äôt keep blaming it on being depressed. Everyone else seems to be getting on. 

It‚Äôs only **me** crying in this semi-empty room, trying to convince myself I won‚Äôt drown, when I *know* I will.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Go to the doctors. Get diagnosed. It sounds like a lot of worrying issues. I can relate to a lot (all) of them. 

Never too late to get help..

author: overwhelmed13
body: I second this.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Recently been getting hungry and angry all day and night long. I just can‚Äôt control myself, I‚Äôve written off my life as worthless and nothing but I know I‚Äôm lying to myself. 
My days are just descending into scream-crying into pillows and blankets while I try to get my shit together for 10 mins of work. Why is being productive such a fucking pain? I can‚Äôt do it. 

Then the failure feelings come along, counting down the minutes til I can officially call this day a waste.

Hopeless.

author: overwhelmed13
body: Amen. Eat, hate your life, sleep, hate your life, repeat.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Knew this sounded familiar. Feel the same way, e x a c t l y the same. 
Weight, life goals, future planning, education - I cant be bothered with any aspect of it despite trying to plan. I can't make a difference in my own life even though I know it can only be me who can change it. Well.. I give up.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Same. I'm mentally dry from trying to be successful at university.  Everyone reminds me I have nothing else on my plate but I'm not okay. I'm not everyone else. I can feel it inside me that whatever I'll pursue I'll just fail. I can't even convince myself otherwise. 

Every point of life after just doesn't seem worth living if it's similar to being like this. An empty shell of a person just wishing they'd die already.

Cheers, to barely getting by.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I don‚Äôt feel good. Ever. 
No one wants to hear me drone on complaining about how I can‚Äôt stand my life and wish it would end. And I get it. But comparing me to someone else‚Äôs non-depressive behaviour just makes me feel invalid.

But then I‚Äôm just left alone to think these things and it never leaves me.. Which is worse?

I wish someone loved me unconditionally (no-one in my family does), someone who wholeheartedly gave a fuck.

Thanks r/depression, you‚Äôre the only one I can count on.

author: overwhelmed13
body: We‚Äôll keep trying.. 234. üôåüèº

author: overwhelmed13
body: Feeling it right now.. ughhhhhhh

author: overwhelmed13
body:
It‚Äôs a shame to be honest, but I do think we have potential and we should try to do the things we want!
Even if it takes a little longer than usual..‚úåüèº

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I don‚Äôt have the energy for anything. I‚Äôm constantly tired and I‚Äôm tired of explaining why.

I think I‚Äôm going to start medication, I‚Äôve tried to just control it myself and go to therapy. But I‚Äôm really done in, and I just want to feel better for one part of the day.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
How do I fix myself? It‚Äôs silly, but I just need a quick fix to survive the next couple of months; after that if I need to be miserable it‚Äôs okay, I‚Äôll manage.

But I‚Äôm so spent everyday, so tired of doing the same shit, thinking and crying about the same shit and it‚Äôs almost too consistent. For someone who can‚Äôt get into routines, I‚Äôm doing pretty amazing at keeping this bs up. 

So, anyone got any quick fixes? My sibs suggest weed. 

Thoughts?

author: overwhelmed13
body: Here hereü§öüèº

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I‚Äôm exhausted, and I wish I was dead. 
Came across a quote the other day, it‚Äôs not groundbreaking, many of you probably know this already but, I couldn‚Äôt relate to anything more.

‚Äúyou can do nothing wrong and still lose, it‚Äôs not fair, it‚Äôs just life‚Äù

Maybe it‚Äôs meant to comfort, it just makes me feel like any attempt I‚Äôve made in my life has been futile. It‚Äôs true. My life is just scraps, and I don‚Äôt want to be here. And I don‚Äôt know who I‚Äôm screaming to, to end my suffering. 

Hanging on by a thread.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Am I to blame for my own depression? I‚Äôve been really out of it recently and tbh I‚Äôm just completely disoriented. 

I can‚Äôt help but think every wrong turn or sour outcome in my life has caused me to make myself like this. Utterly hopeless. Insignificant and worthless. 

But I still need to be a functioning human? How do you do it, when you‚Äôve got no clue as to how to proceed? I can‚Äôt even end my insufferable nonsense because I‚Äôm too chicken shit to do anything about it. 

So basically it‚Äôs all my fault. I did this to myself.

author: overwhelmed13
body: Sorry it didn‚Äôt help. I stopped going to mine because I just felt no different. Hope it gets better

author: overwhelmed13
body:
How do I get my doctor to take me seriously? She doesn‚Äôt want to give me medication but I think I need it. I tried therapy, and it just makes me more paranoid and miserable knowing some stranger knows why I‚Äôm such a mess but rushes me out the door before I feel like I‚Äôve made a slither of progress. 

I just want to feel normal. Will meds help? Thoughts?

author: overwhelmed13
body: This. Thank you.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Same. 
Totally weird but I had a dream about a high school (once upon a time) best friend just last night. I hate that my own brain works against me and it never fails to remind me how much they‚Äôve blossomed and I‚Äôm just a dead twig compared.

But we‚Äôre all on our own journey. And I hope I don‚Äôt always rely on other peoples lives as a comparison to my own. Keep working.. we‚Äôll get there üòå

author: overwhelmed13
body: Thank you, this helped some. It‚Äôs easy to forget (for me anyway) that I‚Äôve got to actively work to be okay.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Maybe funny? 

My younger sib (20f) called me disgusting today. Not as an attack on my personality or as a reaction to my actions. But because I hadn‚Äôt washed my hair in 4 days. Its just a little greasy if anything, it doesn‚Äôt smell, its brushed and tied. I was confused.
I don‚Äôt know why, but it made me feel really small. 

Well, I do know why. 

I have a lot of problems and I don‚Äôt tell her because it seems no matter how close we claim to be, she is always repulsed by me? And these are small things, I feel like I could never say any of the big things for fear of this reaction or worse. I can‚Äôt tell any of my big things to anyone, is it so wrong I wanted my sib to understand? Am I that insecure? Am I looking for acceptance?

I hate myself today because, A) I still didn‚Äôt wash my hair, and B) I‚Äôm so weak that one comment can ruin my day.

author: overwhelmed13
body: So true. Starting is so painful for me, it‚Äôs impossible to do it until I‚Äôm absolutely pushed to the brink.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
This explains so much for me. I‚Äôve been forgetting words and forming nonsense sentences for months now. I just thought I was getting stupid, or maybe depression was making me realise I wasn‚Äôt as smart or legible as I thought. 
Suffering hugely academically due to this frustration, which in turn makes me frustrated more because I can‚Äôt get it together. 

Thanks for this, I may look into this further!

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I‚Äôm always a little bit disappointed when I wake up in the morning. I just wish I‚Äôd sleep forever. No waking up to the things that need to be done, a future to create and care about. 

I can‚Äôt care about anything, I don‚Äôt even care about myself. Can‚Äôt even be bothered to care about myself. 

I‚Äôm not worth it. 

I prove that to myself time and time again.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Just start. It‚Äôs the hardest thing to do. I‚Äôm currently about to ruin my own degree because of my inability to just do the damn thing. 
So just start, forget what other people are doing and what pace they‚Äôre going at. You‚Äôre different and unfortunately, because of what you‚Äôre dealing with, that means you‚Äôll have to work that much harder! 

You can do it! Just begin & it will be okay üòä

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Congratulations! What an achievement, I hope you get the classification you‚Äôre after!

Without detracting from your success, I‚Äôm currently doing my dissertation too, but I have zero motivation. 
Could I ask, how did you keep yourself motivated?

I have maybe 2 weeks left, and every time I approach it, I‚Äôm convinced I‚Äôm going to fail. I feel it in my gut. So I just ignore it/meekly attempt it.

I know this is wrong, but what do I do?

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I get that. It sucks that sometimes you feel like your own worst enemy. I‚Äôve been told I am incredibly self-critical by my counsellor. But, I didn‚Äôt know how to work on this. They don‚Äôt tell you how. They just tell you to be wary of it, like that‚Äôs going to help?

I‚Äôm trying to convince myself failure is not the end of my life, but I know full well, I can‚Äôt take another. I‚Äôm not strong enough.

author: overwhelmed13
body: I can‚Äôt even see past this week. I just want it to be okay to give up.. you know? No one judging me because I couldn‚Äôt do it.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I‚Äôve been really shitty these past few weeks. I used to be quite good at masking how I felt and now, with all the pressure, guilt, shame and lack of control I‚Äôm feeling, I‚Äôm having meltdowns. Constantly.

Yesterday night I ran out of the house. And just cried outside for an hour. I just looked at the clouds and cried because no one is listening. I cried when I tried to eat, and I cried when I went to bed. In a house full of people, no one can see me. No one hears me. Because no one actually cares?
 
Maybe I‚Äôm just being way too corny and ‚Äúin my feelings‚Äù, but am I supposed to feel this way so early in my adulthood? Do I have to face everything alone??

 I can‚Äôt imagine a world where I exist past 25 - I don‚Äôt have it in me. If it‚Äôs more of this, no thanks.

author: overwhelmed13
body: ThisüòÇüôåüèº

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Everyday I‚Äôm told by someone in my family that I‚Äôm a lazy, good-for-nothing slob who won‚Äôt achieve anything because I ‚Äúlie around for 16 hours a day‚Äù. 

Maybe you‚Äôre not meant to tell people when you‚Äôre struggling, if this is how they use it against you. It‚Äôs annoying when you try to do things but you have to fight your own mind to do it. I know it‚Äôs important, whatever I‚Äôm supposed to be doing, but these comments ruin my whole day. It‚Äôs like they‚Äôre disgusted by me.

It just makes me want to prove them right, why bother changing an opinion they already have?

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I, too, hail from a family of narcissists and it sucks - majorly. 
I find sometimes I need to get rid of anything that my mum may get distracted by when I talk (e.g. her phone, TV). Sometimes, I just turn it off or throw it to the side so I can just say my piece. I can't change how anyone reacts or responds, but I really need to get it off my chest. 
I can relate to realising you share some traits with them, it terrifies me. I've said it on occasion to spite them but narcissistic people don't respond well. Just remember, it might look like you'll become like them, but your personality is something you can mould. Don't despair, I'm sure you'll make a wonderful parent one day. Often seeing what we don't want to be like helps us to be better. :)

body:
Your skincare routine sounds a lot like mine before I stopped too (my skin is currently also very angry at me). My room is the same amount of ruin and garbage but it‚Äôs hard to care. I get it. It just feels like an impossible task and it‚Äôs tiring to do anything that requires steady routine. It‚Äôs probably why everything I do sucks because there‚Äôs no routine and well, everyone says consistency is key. Unfortunately I haven‚Äôt mastered that yet, not for myself and not for the real world. 
I hope you feel better, and start taking care of yourself again. There are only a few ways we can show ourselves kindness, maybe it‚Äôs using a cleanser tonight and a moisturiser tomorrow. Or maybe it‚Äôs just cutting yourself some slack for just being able to brush your teeth. Whatever it is, do it for you. ‚ù§Ô∏è

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Seems like parents don‚Äôt realise the damage they do when they say shit like that. My parents scoff at my state and when they cba no more they just tell me ‚Äúgo get it fucking sorted then‚Äù. Like it‚Äôs something that you can switch off. I‚Äôve been a failure since I was 16 anyway and I still am. Even if I didn‚Äôt believe it, it‚Äôs ingrained in my brain now. 

Sorry you‚Äôre dealing with it too. It helps me sometimes to think about who‚Äôs gonna care you were ‚Äúlazy‚Äù or a ‚Äúfailure‚Äù when we don‚Äôt exist anymore. Not the perfect outlook I know, but makes me feel a little less miserable for a minute.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I‚Äôm so deep in my misery, I just want this life to end. I can‚Äôt keep this up. I can‚Äôt keep convincing myself tomorrow is a new day and to do better or try harder. I have, what seems like, an insurmountable amount of work to do. And I feel so stupid whining and crying over work. BUT I CANT HELP IT. I‚Äôm tired of my pathetic spiel. Constantly fighting myself and I‚Äôm tired.

I just want to be less.. everything. I want to *want* to work and try. I want to *want* success. But all I *really* want is death to collect me.

I can‚Äôt hold out any longer, really bad thoughts are invading my mind and ugh, soon I‚Äôll be over at r/suicidewatch 

Thanks for reading my shite of an existence guys

Oh well.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Im the same age and did nothing through my young adulthood that I can reflect on and cherish. I didn‚Äôt even study incredibly hard but I made college my only activity for 3 years of my life.
It is something that eats away at me everyday, as I see my younger siblings become more well-rounded people because they are adventurous and have taken every opportunity to enjoy themselves (as they should). In fact, they‚Äôre all ten times smarter and are more mature and experienced because of it. 

Unfortunately, we can‚Äôt get that time back but it doesn‚Äôt mean our youth is over. You graduated, so congratulations! Now the world is your oyster!! Take up a hobby that interests you, or travel to some places you‚Äôve always wanted to see. Just try and do something that makes you feel GOOD!

That‚Äôs what I‚Äôm going to do. Partying will seem trivial compared to nourishing your soul this way! (I hope). 

Take care OP.  Here in the same boat, rocking with you!

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Sorry you‚Äôre feeling like this! Summer sucks for me too, I really want to do nothing but unfortunately I‚Äôm saddled with a lot of work.

Depending on how old you are, some would suggest finding a job to get out of the house or meet new people (and earn a bit of money). But if that‚Äôs not something you want, go and explore. Once I bought an all-day bus ticket and just went literally anywhere. Just so I wouldn‚Äôt cry myself to sleep all day. 

Feel free to do you! If anything, I understand how you feel, but maybe you can wake up tomorrow and surprise yourself!

Take care  :)

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Felt good this morning. I got up & felt chipper. Went to uni & did a bit of work but now I‚Äôm dwindling down again. Everyone‚Äôs out enjoying the summer weather and somehow I‚Äôve managed to mess my entire summer up by having work to do still, feeling like I‚Äôm about to fail constantly, consistently reminded how out of shape and ugly I am, no graduate job or ANY job whatsoever lined up for afterwards. 

I may not even get my degree. None of it seems worth it anymore. 

I feel scared that I can go from feeling good (almost) to wanting to throw myself into a ravine. I‚Äôm afraid I might do it. 

Can‚Äôt there be a pause button? I‚Äôm so dizzy from going round and round this shit.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
I don‚Äôt want to die. I think it‚Äôs why I keep convincing myself that not being successful is not the end of the world. 

Not being able to finish uni will kill me. If my parents don‚Äôt. This paper proves if I‚Äôm smart or capable enough. And I‚Äôve been faking it so long I don‚Äôt think I can do it anymore.

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just uni‚Äù. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre life isn‚Äôt over‚Äù. If I can‚Äôt do this, if I fail, I‚Äôm going to convince myself to do it. End it once and for all. I don‚Äôt want to live with myself, a failure. By all accounts. I cry about this all the time, it **annoys** me! I hate hearing myself whine but I can‚Äôt stop. No one else gets it, I‚Äôm supposed to do okay. I‚Äôm supposed to be good at this. Why aren‚Äôt I good üòñ

author: overwhelmed13
body:

Got a massive stress/pressure headache though after not eating for so long. I‚Äôm still feeling meh about it all. I‚Äôm still afraid for the future and I don‚Äôt know how to calm down.

Goodnight friends

‚ÄúComparisons are the thief of joy‚Äù 

Don‚Äôt let social media get you down, I have to remind myself that success happens for everyone at different times in different ways. 
It helps me to not go on them any longer because it‚Äôs true people ruminate over what they see and unfortunately it means you end up feeling pretty crap over it. 

I‚Äôm 22 too, and I feel the same way about my situation. I hope you find it in you one day to pursue your dreams. It‚Äôs never too late to get after them

But the cards we‚Äôre dealt right? Thanks for replying :)

It felt really real, to be wanted. There‚Äôs so much uncertainty in my life right now and I think I just dreamt up something i signed away because it‚Äôs distracting. But boy did it make me feel something I‚Äôve not felt ever. So weird. 

P.s. - I hate my life rn. No energy, no drive, just listlessly waiting for something to save me. 

Have a good day guys üíñ

author: overwhelmed13

I‚Äôm sorry you feel that way, it‚Äôs really disheartening to keep wanting to go on like this I know.

But congratulations on your exam result!! I‚Äôm really happy for you, just keep riding that wave, you‚Äôll do well.

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Imagine hating yourself so much that you keep sabotaging yourself.

Keep deciding that your future isn‚Äôt worth it so you don‚Äôt try. Keep crying and screaming about it. Keep banging your head on the wall hoping some fucking cog starts turning and saves you from doing the same bs. 

Can‚Äôt kill myself, so instead I‚Äôll just resign myself to being the village idiot. The embarrassment. The worst part?

No one even cares. 

Not one person to turn to, to cry to, to hug or feel anything. It‚Äôs come to the point where you have to hug yourself. Wrap your arms around your shoulders and pretend someone is holding you steady. I‚Äôm tired of playing pretend. 

Just one iota of happiness. Just one.

author: overwhelmed13
body: A mutually enhancing cycle. Wish the noise would stop

author: overwhelmed13
body:
Everyone around me keeps telling me about everyone else‚Äôs success. Meanwhile I‚Äôm crying in the university bathroom wondering how the fuck I keep ending up here??

I‚Äôm so tired of myself. My constant failure and this shroud of doubt always looming over me. So much of my life is shaped around how well I‚Äôve done in comparison to others and it just sucks knowing how much of a hold this one particular thing has over me. 
I can‚Äôt see anything else, I don‚Äôt have anything else. I‚Äôm deficient in every single way possible and I want to give up. I genuinely do. 

I just wish I was never born, never brought into this situation. Never made to be here. 

I hope I die tonight. I sincerely do.

Unfortunately, I guess I‚Äôm just scared of taking risks and uncertainty is something that frightens the living fuck out of me. Going to uni was supposed to be a sure thing. A piece of paper to say yep I‚Äôve done it. I guess not anymore.

If I fail, I‚Äôll end up doing something I know. Just might not be what I expected, might not be well-paid and it might not make me happy. 
But thanks anyway, maybe I‚Äôll lean into more hobbies and forget about what a mess I‚Äôve made.

body: I basically do the same thing. I try to watch a bunch of funny videos to go to bed. But I still think you should write. Even if it‚Äôs a bunch of nonsense. She said she didn‚Äôt care what we wrote just that we were writing. ‚ÄúIf all you write is ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt know what to write‚Äô that‚Äôs fine as long as you write it for 5 minutes straight‚Äù. And remember you can always delete it later.

author: perfectcontrarian
body: Summer break has always been hard for me too. Try to make a schedule. Also try to get out in the sun. Not for too long and wear sunscreen. Make some online friends (it‚Äôs great to have people to talk to). Maybe pick up a couple of hobbies. I try to do 3. An active one (running for me), something to stimulate your mind (I love reading) and something that‚Äôs just fun ( I‚Äôm an art student so I try to do crafts that I can give out to friends and family. My point is try to stay busy. I know it can be hard to find that motivation but it only gets harder if you let it get worse. Take care of yourself. I hope this summer will much better than expected!

author: sweetztheloli
body:
1 if she‚Äôs a baby then I think you can cry in front of her, Because she probably won‚Äôt remember it the next day (Only if you really need to watch her and you‚Äôre trying your hardest not to cry) 
2 if she is My age range  ( 10-13 years old)  then i‚Äôm pretty sure you can leave her alone for a minute to get yourself together (as long as you‚Äôre not in a public space) 
3 sometimes kids can pick up on your issues without you saying anything or showing any signs. We are better at reading emotions than adults. So she may already know that you‚Äôre sad (don‚Äôt take my word for it tho maybe you‚Äôre really really good at hiding it)

author: sweetztheloli
body: OK I made a worded it weird, but what I‚Äôm trying to say is there is no good or bad person it‚Äôs just ourselves giving ourselves labels And I Kinda don‚Äôt know how describe it (because I‚Äôm 13)  and what I mean by not always having a good mental state, is sometimes we break it down sometimes we get hurt mentally, but we shouldn‚Äôt think badly about ourselves because of it, because it‚Äôs only natural to sometimes break down and take some time for yourself you can‚Äôt always be happy you can‚Äôt always be perfectly, and it‚Äôs ok you‚Äôre allowed to not always be in the right State of mind, you‚Äôre allowed to have a bad state of mental health (as long as you‚Äôre given the right type of help) because unfortunately it‚Äôs so common to be that way, that it might just be second nature to people, so yes isn‚Äôt it our nature and I think it‚Äôs ok that I got it wrong, because you pointed it out and now I can learn from it, Because I want to make people feel better in the subreddit not offended or hurt because  something I said. And I know this text is really long but I hope this is helpful :)

author: witchofthewoods89
body:
It's been a terrible trip honestly. I spent a lot of my savings on it and paid for her, she complained the entire time and called me everything in front of people. I mean she literally filmed herself complaining about the hotel I booked and paid for in front of me and rang her boyfriend up telling him how terrible it was. Kept fighting with me in the convention too and threatened to storm off. Then in a big line of people she kept telling me I smelt bad. Then she told me the guest I got my photo with was laughing at me. Then at 9am right before the convention she had something in her hand to throw at me there was screaming every single night. Never again. And even just now I heard her muttering to herself how much she hates me and how she wish she aborted me. She continues to tell me daily that she wishes I were dead. I need out of this house now. She ruined that trip and I'm ashamed to call that creature my mother. All of this stress has resulted in my hair falling out in clumps, I'm sat up at 6am currently deleting all the photos of her in my phone. I hate her and I hate my life. I want out and to never see that hag again.

Also thank you, you seem cool too x

author: witchofthewoods89
body: They guessed I had a disease basically and injected me with dangerous drugs I didn't need for 5 days and wouldn't listen when I told them it was making me worse. The doctor told me I'd die if I didn't take them which was bullshit and then sent me off overnight close to covid patients in a ward where no one knew wtf was wrong with me after doing various blood tests. When all they had to do was send me to a skin specialist, which I asked them to do and they refused. Told me I'd have to go back to A & E again after a week of suffering. And they treated not only me but all the old people there like garbage, one old lady called pearl was screaming all night and day when they came up to her. I felt awful and wanted to help they just told me she was crazy which I doubt it. It was literally a hellraiser hospital of fucked up inbred doctors/nurses. The nurse ripped my IV out and bandage off and it was so painful then mocked me for being afraid. Then she told me I was dirty for wearing my mask/hat/glasses and gloves. Told me how I was spreading more germs and how I would get sicker for doing that (yet she had no gloves or mask on herself and another doctor mocked me for wearing a mask told me i was being paranoid how they weren't wearing any). I basically told her to fuck off and refused to take it off my face. It was a nightmare.
